main event: A UFO was sighted in Platte County, Missouri, exhibiting strange movements and lights in August 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared as a strange light moving up and down, forward and back, and seemed stationary at times,The light was fluorescent blue with lights on the sides that appeared to be windows,It made a rattling or humming noise that could be felt more than heard, The sighting lasted over 2 hours and involved observations from ground radar and air visual, The report originally concluded it could be attributed to an overexcited imagination but was carried as an unidentifiable report.
sighted object: a strange light resembling a factory-type object
